channel.title: Geocaching
channel.description:
Anybody in this community attempt? I will soon be going on my 400th find! Woop woop. I have found stupid rocks, money, car keys, cell phones, diaries and dead animals. Some rewards are good, others truly do suck but it has been an adventure.
Here is the website below if you're interested.
http://www.geocaching.com/
My all time favorite one was in Vegas. It's an electric box that's not suppose to be there out on a pole, I believe it is unlisted and they only give you the coordinates.. I found $100 that day :D

item.title: Geocaching
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I’ve found puzzles, and a CD once. Nothing else though.

Read full topic

item.title: Geocaching
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Anybody in this community attempt? I will soon be going on my 400th find! Woop woop. I have found stupid rocks, money, car keys, cell phones, diaries and dead animals. Some rewards are good, others truly do suck but it has been an adventure.

Here is the website below if you’re interested.

Geocaching

Get the free Official Geocaching app and join the world's largest treasure hunt.

There are millions of geocaches worldwide, just waiting for you to find them. There are probably even some within walking distance of where you are right now. Visit Geocaching.com to see just how many geocaches are nearby and to learn how to start...

My all time favorite one was in Vegas. It’s an electric box that’s not suppose to be there out on a pole, I believe it is unlisted and they only give you the coordinates… I found $100 that day

Read full topic
